name: Real Jail Break Adventure
description:
You were on a mission in a city of criminals and doing your duty like a hero. Your mission was to collect information about their secret forces movement. But their local guards managed to caught you and imprisoned you in the world’s most dreadful prison. The police warden assigned special guards and police dogs to keep eye on you. It’s not easy to breakout the highly secured prison because there are CCTV cameras and special sniper shooters standing on the roof of the building. You are a well-trained spy and you know all the tricks to escape from the jail like this. Break the passcode and escape from your torture cell on coming night. Kill the guards one by one like a real professional agent. Be careful don’t make a noise otherwise they will get alert. You will have to fight hand to hand combat with guards. They are well equipped with modern guns and deadly weapons. They will not think twice to shoot you in this prison fighting game.

Game Features:
-> Fabulous 3D cell environment
-> Passcode and hidden CCTV cameras.
->Different 20+ survival missions.
->Smooth realistic control with amazing effects.
->Addictive Gameplay with 3d marvelous graphics.
->Real gun shooting and fighting action.
->Top real sound effects.
